name: voygen-librechat
description: Voygen API with LibreChat integration for Render.com hosting

scripts.install-librechat: npm run clone-librechat && npm run setup-librechat
scripts.setup-librechat: npm install -g rimraf && cd librechat && npm ci && npm install rollup @rollup/plugin-alias @rollup/plugin-typescript rollup-plugin-typescript2 @rollup/plugin-node-resolve rollup-plugin-peer-deps-external @rollup/plugin-commonjs @rollup/plugin-replace @rollup/plugin-terser @rollup/plugin-json @types/js-yaml && cd ..
scripts.build-all: npm run build && cd librechat && npm run frontend

author: Voygen Team
